skills.name: JavaScript
skills.more: A versatile programming language primarily used for creating interactive web applications.

skills.name: Python
skills.more: A high-level, interpreted programming language known for its readability and broad usage in various domains.

skills.name: React
skills.more: A JavaScript library for building user interfaces, especially single-page applications with complex state management.

skills.name: Node.js
skills.more: A runtime environment that allows executing JavaScript code server-side, known for its event-driven architecture.

skills.name: CSS
skills.more: A stylesheet language used for describing the presentation of a document written in HTML or XML.
